description: This file defines jQuery's event handling system, including event registration, removal, triggering, and normalization of event objects. It includes internal helper functions and special event handling logic.

classes.name: jQuery.Event
classes.description: Constructor for creating normalized event objects with methods to prevent default actions and stop propagation.

methods.name: on
methods.description: Attaches event handlers to elements, supporting multiple event types and delegation.

methods.name: one
methods.description: Attaches a one-time event handler to elements.

methods.name: trigger
methods.description: Triggers an event on selected elements.

methods.name: triggerHandler
methods.description: Triggers an event on the first element without bubbling.
